articles.title: Stock Market Today: Top 10 things to know before the market opens - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The SGX Nifty indicates a negative start for the broader index with a loss of 28 points on Monday amid US markets teetering over the stalemate in debt ceiling decision. European markets throw up positive vibes but Asian indices trade mixed
articles.content: The market is likely to open marginally lower on Monday as the SGX Nifty indicates a negative start for the broader index, with a loss of 28 points after opening the session at 18,209. SGX futures to… [+5214 chars]

articles.title: Asia markets mixed as China leaves loan rates unchanged; U.S. debt ceiling talks to resume - CNBC
articles.description: The People's Bank of China left its 1-year and 5-year loan prime rates unchanged, in line with expectations.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Feed
articles.title: After US reports 2 highly contagious ringworm cases, CDC says ‘World is not ready’: Report - Economic Times
articles.description: Two women from the US have been infected with the drug-resistant strain of ringworm known as tinea. Experts say that the disease is highly contagious and is spreading mainly in South Asia.
articles.content: The United States has reported two cases of a highly contagious and drug-resistant fungal disease, known as tinea or ringworm. This has raised an alarm among medical professionals.Two women, aged 28 … [+2614 chars]
